argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | pmtrdifel.t | |- T = ran ( pmTrsp ` ( N \ { K } ) ) |
| 2 |  | pmtrdifel.r | |- R = ran ( pmTrsp ` N ) |
| 3 |  | pmtrdifwrdel.0 | |- U = ( x e. ( 0 ..^ ( # ` W ) ) |-> ( ( pmTrsp ` N ) ` dom ( ( W ` x ) \ _I ) ) ) |
| 4 |  | #P_simpr | |- ( ( ( W e. Word T /\ K e. N ) /\ i e. ( 0 ..^ ( # ` W ) ) ) -> i e. ( 0 ..^ ( # ` W ) ) ) |
| 5 |  | #P_fvex | |- ( ( pmTrsp ` N ) ` dom ( ( W ` i ) \ _I ) ) e. _V |
| 6 |  | #P_fveq2 | |- ( x = i -> ( W ` x ) = ( W ` i ) ) |
| 7 | 6 | #P_difeq1d | |- ( x = i -> ( ( W ` x ) \ _I ) = ( ( W ` i ) \ _I ) ) |
| 8 | 7 | #P_dmeqd | |- ( x = i -> dom ( ( W ` x ) \ _I ) = dom ( ( W ` i ) \ _I ) ) |
| 9 | 8 | #P_fveq2d | |- ( x = i -> ( ( pmTrsp ` N ) ` dom ( ( W ` x ) \ _I ) ) = ( ( pmTrsp ` N ) ` dom ( ( W ` i ) \ _I ) ) ) |
| 10 | 9, 3 | #P_fvmptg | |- ( ( i e. ( 0 ..^ ( # ` W ) ) /\ ( ( pmTrsp ` N ) ` dom ( ( W ` i ) \ _I ) ) e. _V ) -> ( U ` i ) = ( ( pmTrsp ` N ) ` dom ( ( W ` i ) \ _I ) ) ) |
| 11 | 4, 5, 10 | #P_sylancl | |- ( ( ( W e. Word T /\ K e. N ) /\ i e. ( 0 ..^ ( # ` W ) ) ) -> ( U ` i ) = ( ( pmTrsp ` N ) ` dom ( ( W ` i ) \ _I ) ) ) |
| 12 | 11 | #P_fveq1d | |- ( ( ( W e. Word T /\ K e. N ) /\ i e. ( 0 ..^ ( # ` W ) ) ) -> ( ( U ` i ) ` K ) = ( ( ( pmTrsp ` N ) ` dom ( ( W ` i ) \ _I ) ) ` K ) ) |
| 13 |  | #P_wrdsymbcl | |- ( ( W e. Word T /\ i e. ( 0 ..^ ( # ` W ) ) ) -> ( W ` i ) e. T ) |
| 14 | 13 | #P_adantlr | |- ( ( ( W e. Word T /\ K e. N ) /\ i e. ( 0 ..^ ( # ` W ) ) ) -> ( W ` i ) e. T ) |
| 15 |  | #P_simplr | |- ( ( ( W e. Word T /\ K e. N ) /\ i e. ( 0 ..^ ( # ` W ) ) ) -> K e. N ) |
| 16 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( ( pmTrsp ` N ) ` dom ( ( W ` i ) \ _I ) ) = ( ( pmTrsp ` N ) ` dom ( ( W ` i ) \ _I ) ) |
| 17 | 1, 2, 16 | #P_pmtrdifellem4 | |- ( ( ( W ` i ) e. T /\ K e. N ) -> ( ( ( pmTrsp ` N ) ` dom ( ( W ` i ) \ _I ) ) ` K ) = K ) |
| 18 | 14, 15, 17 | #P_syl2anc | |- ( ( ( W e. Word T /\ K e. N ) /\ i e. ( 0 ..^ ( # ` W ) ) ) -> ( ( ( pmTrsp ` N ) ` dom ( ( W ` i ) \ _I ) ) ` K ) = K ) |
| 19 | 12, 18 | #P_eqtrd | |- ( ( ( W e. Word T /\ K e. N ) /\ i e. ( 0 ..^ ( # ` W ) ) ) -> ( ( U ` i ) ` K ) = K ) |
| 20 | 19 | #P_ralrimiva | |- ( ( W e. Word T /\ K e. N ) -> A. i e. ( 0 ..^ ( # ` W ) ) ( ( U ` i ) ` K ) = K ) |
